ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: The illness is causing financial problems for the family
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Time is lost from work because of hospital appointments
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: I am cutting down the hours I work to care for my child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Additional income is needed in order to cover medical expenses
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: I stopped working because of my child's illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Because of the illness, we are not able to travel out of the city
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: People in the neighborhood treat us specially because of my child's illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: We have little desire to go out because of my child's illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: It is hard to find a reliable person to take care of my child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Sometimes we have to change plans about going out at the last minute because of my child's state
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: We see family and friends less because of the illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Because of what we have shared we are a closer family
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I wonder whether my child should be treated ''specially'' or the same as a normal child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: My relatives have been understanding and helpful with my child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: I think about not having more children because of the illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: My partner and I discuss my child's problems together
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: We try to treat my child as if he/she were a normal child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: I don't have much time left over for other family members after caring for my child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Are your child's sibling(s) 4 years or older?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: Relatives interfere and think they know what's best for my child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: There is fighting between the children because of my child's special needs
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree; Respond if fam_impact_sibling_age = 1

ElementDescription: Our family gives up things because of my child's illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: My other children are frightened by his/her illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree; Respond if fam_impact_sibling_age = 1

ElementDescription: Fatigue is a problem for me because of my child's illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: My other children seem to have more illnesses, aches and pain than most children their age
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree; Respond if fam_impact_sibling_age = 1

ElementDescription: I live from day to day and don't plan for the future
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: The school grades of my other children suffer because of my child's illness
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree; Respond if fam_impact_sibling_age = 1

ElementDescription: Nobody understands the burden I carry
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Traveling to the hospital is a strain on me
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Learning to manage my child's illness has made me feel better about myself
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: I worry about what will happen to my child in the future (when he/she grows up, when I am not around)
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I feel like we live on a roller coaster: in crisis when my child is acutely ill, OK when things are stable
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Does your child have sibling(s) in the household?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: It is hard to give much attention to the other children because of the needs of my child
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree; Respond if fam_impact_sibling = 1

ElementDescription: Having a child with an illness makes me worry about my other children's health
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Strongly disagree; Respond if fam_impact_sibling = 1
